kw.name: Create Session
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=mysess, url=http://127.0.0.1:5000, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/v1/restaurants path_url=/api/v1/restaurants headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.5', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '41', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"name": "Dominos", "location": "Mumbai"}'
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.
